intro_text: The leaves drift high in sunset piles beneath the shedding trees, and as the patrol wanders familiar forest paths, app1 gets swallowed up.
decline_text: app1 reappears soon enough, a bright red leaf plastered to {PRONOUN/app1/poss} forehead.

success_outcomes.text: app1 explodes out of the leaf drift, bowling over app2! Laughing, p_l bats at r_c, claws sheathed, and skids off the path into the leaves as the patrol devolves into rustling, raucous, riotous fun.

fail_outcomes.text: app1? app1?! It takes a good while to recover the apprentice from the far-deeper-than-expected leaf drift. No one is hurt, but it certainly derails the training they were intending on doing.

intro_text: The leaves drift high in sunset piles beneath the shedding trees, and as the patrol wanders familiar forest paths, app1 gets swallowed up.
decline_text: app1 reappears soon enough, a bright red leaf plastered to {PRONOUN/app1/poss} forehead.

success_outcomes.text: app1 leaps out of the leaf drift, sending p_l falling into r_c as {PRONOUN/app1/subject} {VERB/app1/leap/leaps} onwards to bowl app2 into yet more leaves. The two apprentices descend into furious mock combat, yowling with excitement, as p_l gazes up at r_c in bewilderment.

fail_outcomes.text: app1? app1?! It takes a good while to recover the apprentice from the far-deeper-than-expected leaf drift. No one is hurt, but it certainly derails the training they were intending on doing.

intro_text: The leaves drift high in sunset piles beneath the shedding trees, and as the patrol wanders familiar forest paths, app1 gets swallowed up.
decline_text: app1 reappears soon enough, a bright red leaf plastered to {PRONOUN/app1/poss} forehead.

success_outcomes.text: app1 leaps out of the leaf drift, bowling app2 head over paws and batting at {PRONOUN/app2/subject} furiously. p_l and r_c share a long, exasperated look, rolling their eyes as the apprentices flicker between yelling insults and flirting while they spar. p_l's sure the apprentices think they're very subtle.

fail_outcomes.text: app1? app1?! It takes a good while to recover the apprentice from the far-deeper-than-expected leaf drift. No one is hurt, but it certainly derails the training they were intending on doing.
